name: Spicy Carrots Tinapa
description: Spicy Carrots Tinapa is a flavorful and nutritious dish that is perfect for anyone looking to enjoy a healthy yet indulgent meal. This recipe combines spiralized carrot noodles with fresh zucchini, tomatoes, olives, and delicious Tamban, creating a high-fiber and high-sodium delightful blend that fits right into your healthy lifestyle. Dive into this healthyfied recipe that promises not just great taste but also a boost to your health.
recipeIngredient: 1  eggplant peeled (yield from 1-1/4 lb), Eggplant, raw

recipeInstructions.text: Rinse the Tamban (sardines) under cold water and set aside.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 1

recipeInstructions.text: Spiralize the carrots to create carrot noodles and peel the eggplant. Chop the eggplant, tomatoes, and zucchini into desired sizes.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 2

recipeInstructions.text: Mince the garlic cloves and slice the olives.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 3

recipeInstructions.text: In a bowl, mix the salt and ground pepper.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 4

recipeInstructions.text: Heat the extra-virgin olive oil in a pan over medium heat. Add the minced garlic and saut√© until it's fragrant, about 2 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 5

recipeInstructions.text: Add the Tamban (sardines) to the pan and cook for 5 minutes. Remove the sardines and set aside.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 6

recipeInstructions.text: In the same pan, add the spiralized carrot noodles, chopped eggplant, zucchini, and tomatoes. Cook for 8 minutes, until the vegetables are tender.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 7

recipeInstructions.text: Gently mix in the sardines and olives into the pan. Season with the salt and pepper mixture. Cook for an additional 2 minutes, allowing all flavors to meld together.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 8
